description: Helpers enabled when booting to this Linode configuration.

devtmpfs_automount.description: Populates the `/dev` directory early during boot without `udev`.  Defaults to `false`.

distro.description: Helps maintain correct `inittab` or `upstart` console device.

modules_dep.description: Creates a modules dependency file for the kernel you run.

network.description: Set to `true` to automatically configure static networking.

updatedb_disabled.description: Set to `true` to disable the `updatedb` cron job to avoid disk thrashing.
